troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.message1: 1. Make sure Strongbox is installed and running.
troubleshooting.message2: 2. Make sure you are a Pro user, AutoFill is a paid Pro feature.
troubleshooting.message3: 3. Check the setting below is enabled:
troubleshooting.settings-path: Settings > Advanced > Chrome & Firefox AutoFill Extension

not-running-popup-component.message: Unfortunately Strongbox isn't yet available on this platform.
